title: Neil deGrasse Tyson :-)
description:
Neil deGrasse Tyson (Letters From an Astrophysicist) tells Justin the real story of why Pluto is no longer a planet. Then, Neil reminisces about the time he told James Cameron about a huge astronomical error in Titanic.
